result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Howard Joshua Adams III

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Howard Joshua Adams III in court.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Howard Joshua Adams III.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a jury trial (first call). Case is in trial posture. Defense requests an adjournment due to the defendant's medical issues. Discussion held. State does not object. Court vacates today's jury trial. Defense requests new final pre-trial and jury trial dates. Case adjourned.
Final pre-trial scheduled for January 4, 2023 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 23, 2023 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Howard Joshua Adams III appeared by video.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in Court for Howard Joshua Adams III.  Attorney Navjot Singh Hira in Court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial. Discussion placed on the record. Case remains in trial posture. Court addressed Motions in Limine, Witness Lists, and Jury Instructions. Court issued a Sequestration Order. No additional issues need to be addressed at this time. Court ordered case adjourned for Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 15. Jury Trial scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Defense Motion In Limine; received and filed.
State's Motions in Limine received and filed.
State's Jury instructions received and filed.

Defendant Howard Joshua Adams in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST.Case in court for a Scheduling Conference.
Defense advises the court case is in trial posture and  request a final pretrial and jury trial dates. 
Court ordered parties to file their Pretrial documents 48 hours in advance of the final pretrial hearing.
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Howard Joshua Adams in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for a Pretrial Conference.
Discussion held off the record. Defense in receipt of discovery and offer and request time to review and discuss with the defendant. 
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19. This hearing will be streamed Live through dacast- via Zoom.
  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 5, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on May 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered no possession or use of any dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Howard Joshua Adams in court.  Alexandria S. Carlson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Kori Ashley, Branch 19.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 19 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/03/2022@02:30pm
